mapper.select:
select count(*) from post
where ${category} like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
where ${category} like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
where post_title like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' or post_content like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

select * from (select row_number()over(order by post_group desc, post_step asc) rnum, a.* from post a) where rnum=( select rnum from (select row_number()over(order by post_group desc, post_step asc) rnum, a.* from post a) where post_no=#{post_no} )-1

select * from (select row_number()over(order by post_group desc, post_step asc) rnum, a.* from post a) where rnum=( select rnum from (select row_number()over(order by post_group desc, post_step asc) rnum, a.* from post a) where post_no=#{post_no} )+1
